name: Lucas 定理
complexity: O(p + T log_p n) for prime modulus p, T queries; for composite modulus, depends on factorization and prime powers
scenarios: Computing large binomial coefficients modulo a number, especially when n is huge (e.g., 1e18) and modulus is relatively small (e.g., 1e6)
extensions: exLucas algorithm for composite modulus, factorial modulo prime power, Chinese Remainder Theorem integration
